ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: When the earth is shaken up convulsively,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: when the earth will suddenly shake with a terrible shaking,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: When the earth is violently shaken
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: When the earth will tremble, shivering.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: When the earth will be shaken with a terrible shake.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: When the earth shall be shaken with a (severe) shaking,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: when the earth shall be rocked
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: When the earth is shaken with a shock
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: When the earth is shaken violently,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: This will happen when the earth is shaken, shaken
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: When the earth is shaken violently,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: When the earth shall be shaken to its depths,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: When the earth will be shaken with a terrible shake.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: When the earth is shaken with a shock.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: When the earth is shaken with convulsion
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [56:4] When the earth is shaken with a violent shock,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (When the earth is shaken with a shock) when the earth is shaken with such an earthquake that every mountain and building in it will be obliterated and turn into rubble.
